channel.title: Claude on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Claude on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: The personhood trap: How AI fakes human personality
item.description: AI assistants don’t have fixed personalities—just patterns of output guided by humans.

item.title: Anthropic’s auto-clicking AI Chrome extension raises browser-hijacking concerns
item.description: Malicious websites can embed invisible commands that AI agents will follow blindly.

item.title: New AI browser agents create risks if sites hijack them with hidden instructions
item.description: Malicious websites can embed invisible commands that AI agents will follow blindly.

item.title: In Xcode 26, Apple shows first signs of offering ChatGPT alternatives
item.description: Claude support in Xcode heralds bigger moves across the ecosystem.
